item_category: Go beyond with the Reno4 to capture the action of the night. The Triple Laser Detection Auto Focus (LDAF) Camera paired with Ultra Steady Video 3.0 is perfect to focus quickly, steadily and accurately in low light environments. Add to that OPPO's 65W SuperVOOC 2.0 flash charge technology, charging over 60% in 15 minutes, fully charging in 36 minutes. Its powerful Snapdragon 765G chipset delivers the best of 5G yet is housed in a slim body weighing only 183g to deliver a comfortable yet speedy experience.
review_text: Excellent phone and great price. More than happy with my purchase
Great phone, easy to use, does everything I need to do and looks nice.
